import React,{lazy,Suspense,useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import Header from'./components/Header';import Home from'./components/Home';import CatigoriesList from'./components/CatigoriesList';import Meals from'./components/meals';import Contact from'./components/Contact';import FooterII from'./components/FooterII';import{Route,Routes}from"react-router-dom";import LoaderCategories from'./components/loader/LoaderCategories';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeaderPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/Header')));const HomePage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/Home')));const CatigoriesListPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/CatigoriesList')));const MealsCat=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/meals')));const ContactPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/Contact')));const Footer=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/FooterII')));function App(){const[category,setCategory]=useState([]);//Get All Gategories
const getCategory=async()=>{const data=await axios.get('https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/categories.php');setCategory(data.data.categories);};useEffect(()=>{getCategory();},[]);const search=async word=>{if(word===""){getCategory();}else{const data=await axios.get(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?s=${word}`);setCategory(data.data.meals);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Suspense,{fallback:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoaderCategories,{}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeaderPage,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{search:search}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CatigoriesListPage,{category:category})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/category/:categoryName",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MealsCat,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/contact",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactPage,{})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]})});}function delayForDemo(promise){return new Promise(resolve=>{setTimeout(resolve,2000);}).then(()=>promise);}export default App;
